import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { HashRouter as Router, NavLink, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import Home from './pages/home' import BetaWallet from './pages/betawallet' import LightWallet from './pages/lightwallet' import MyWanWallet from './pages/mywanwallet' import logo from './images/wanchain-logo.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function App() { const activeNavStyle = {color: "rgb(0,165,255)", textDecoration: "underline", marginRight: "30px"} const navStyle = {fontSize: "1.8rem", fontWeight: 700, color: "white", textDecoration: "none", marginRight: "30px" } return (
Home Beta Wallet Light Wallet MyWanWallet
); } export default App;
